content: आश्लिष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Embraced, clasped; used actively also; आश्लिष्टो लक्ष्मीं <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--2@} Connected, interwoven, blended; परस्पराश्लिष्टशाखैः पादपैः <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} Joined to, touching, in contact with; अवनितलाश्लिष्टललाटरेखया <ls>K. 67</ls>; अंगद° भुज <ls>R. 6. 53</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 72</ls>; मेघमाश्लिष्टसानुं <ls>Me. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Joining what adheres or attaches to. {@--5@} Invested; spread. {@--6@} Deduced, concluded.
